description.point1: E-commerce application showcasing extensive product range.
description.point2: Orchestrated authentication, shopping cart, and checkout.
description.point3: Created visually appealing and optimized UI by using React.js and JavaScript (Component-Based Architecture).
description.point4: Elevated user experience with Material UI and Bootstrap.
description.point5: Dynamically loaded and presented data from the backend server through REST APIs, ensuring real-time information.
description.point6: Successfully deployed the website on Netlify for easy access.

description.point1: Created web pages using HTML and CSS and made them dynamic using JavaScript
description.point2: Improved UX with multi-select filters, image carouselsImplemented conditional rendering of page elements
description.point3: Implemented conditional rendering of page elements
description.point4: Utilized localStorage to persist user preferences at client-side and facilitated reservation form submission using fetch API.
description.point5: Deployed the website using Netlify/Vercel for Frontend and Render for Backend

description.point1: A Clone of dashboard for Chaabi Website using HTML/CSS and React
description.point2: Used Material UI for React Components and styling.
description.point3: React Chart is used for creating different Graphs and Charts
description.point4: Successfully deployed the website on Netlify for easy access.
